body.p: The top slot in this week's Gentoo Weekly Newsletter celebrates the 2006.0 release of Gentoo Linux. Reports from the FOSDEM conference in Brussels and the 3rd European Gentoo developer meeting, a call for participation in next Saturday's Bugday conclude the news about a very busy week for the project. Things aren't slowing down, either, with Gentoo to be represented at a conference in Germany on the next weekend, and of course the usual security announcements and bugzilla statistics are included in this week's GWN, too. Enjoy reading it!
